column3: Please could you send more water to our camp, weather is hotter than anticipated.
Good news! A local charity service delivered blankets an hour ago. We just distributed these to our refugees!
Medical Aid Needed! We have an endemic gasto-enteretis going around seeking medical resources and personnel!
A refugee family is asking if we could provide a book of prayer. Seems very important to them. Is this a possibility?
What is the SOP for a flood?
